oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Milton. Abby Crawford Milton letter to Mrs. White. 3-22-1916 01
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Abby Crawford Milton (Mrs. George Fort Milton), Headquarters, Tennessee Equal Suffrage Campaign Committee, Chattanooga, TN, to Mrs. [Hugh L.] White. March 22, 1916. Page 1 of 3. Re: need for a state Constitutional Convention.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Women's suffrage; Politics & government;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Abby Crawford Milton
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Mrs. Hugh L. White Papers, folder 2
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
